response.original_title: Dracula, l'amour plus fort que la mort
response.overview: Dracula, Love is stronger than death is The Most Anticipated Movies of 2019 Looper.com ... he Kamel Ouali work was inspired by Bram Stoker's Dracula and by the film version by Francis Ford Coppola. A filmed version of the work was also shown on wide screens throughout France between 20 and 22 July 2012.
response.title: Dracula, Love is Stronger than Death
